title: (x) Looking for this contrasty sans - Retro Super Skinny {self (Marek K)}
content:
No serifs still very noble...

author: knap

comments.content:
Hi Marek,

there’s no image.  
Need help? [How to post a sample or image](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831115634/http:/typophile.com/node/18067)  
In particular, make sure that:

- the file name does not contain spaces (or any other ø∂∂ ¢håræct€rs)
- you have the right [Flash plugin](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831115634/http:/www.adobe.com/products/flashplayer/) installed with your browser
In the meantime, here’s a [list of thin stressed sans typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831115634/http:/typophile.com/node/67084#comment-394345).
OK, Florian - it's Retro Super Skinny. Thanks for the link!
Ha! That list starts paying off. :-)
